title: CoinDesk 20 Performance Update: Avalanche (AVAX) Slides 7.1%, Leading Index Lower
source: CoinDesk: Bitcoin, Ethereum, Crypto News and Price Data

body.raw: NEAR Protocol (NEAR) was also among the underperformers, declining 6.1% from Thursday.
